_metadata.description: Energy Materials Expansion - 60 materials for batteries, solar cells, fuel cells, energy storage

LCO.name: Lithium Cobalt Oxide
LCO.notes: LiCoO2, consumer electronics, 140 mAh/g practical, 4.2V vs Li, thermal instability

NMC_111.name: Lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxide 111
NMC_111.notes: LiNi1/3Mn1/3Co1/3O2, balanced performance, 160 mAh/g, EVs, 3.7V vs Li

NMC_622.name: Lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxide 622
NMC_622.notes: LiNi0.6Mn0.2Co0.2O2, high energy, 180 mAh/g, EVs, cost reduction

NMC_811.name: Lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxide 811
NMC_811.notes: LiNi0.8Mn0.1Co0.1O2, highest energy NMC, 200 mAh/g, EVs, less stable

NCA.name: Lithium Nickel Cobalt Aluminum Oxide
NCA.notes: LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2, Tesla cells, 200 mAh/g, high power, less stable

LFP.name: Lithium Iron Phosphate
LFP.notes: LiFePO4, ultra-safe, 160 mAh/g, 3.2V vs Li, long cycle life, EVs/storage

LMO.name: Lithium Manganese Oxide
LMO.notes: LiMn2O4, spinel, 120 mAh/g, 4.0V vs Li, safe, power tools, Mn dissolution

LMFP.name: Lithium Manganese Iron Phosphate
LMFP.notes: LiMn0.5Fe0.5PO4, higher voltage than LFP, 160 mAh/g, 3.5V vs Li

LNO.name: Lithium Nickel Oxide
LNO.notes: LiNiO2, high capacity 200 mAh/g, unstable, precursor to NMC/NCA

LRLO.name: Lithium-Rich Layered Oxide
LRLO.notes: Li1.2Mn0.54Ni0.13Co0.13O2, >250 mAh/g, voltage fade, next-gen cathode

Graphite_Anode.name: Graphite (Battery Grade)
Graphite_Anode.notes: LiC6, 372 mAh/g theoretical, 350 practical, SEI formation, dominant anode

Hard_Carbon.name: Hard Carbon
Hard_Carbon.notes: Non-graphitizable carbon, Na-ion batteries, 300 mAh/g, disordered

Silicon_Anode.name: Silicon (Battery Anode)
Silicon_Anode.notes: Li15Si4, 3579 mAh/g theoretical, 300% expansion, next-gen anode

SiO_Anode.name: Silicon Monoxide (Battery Anode)
SiO_Anode.notes: SiO, 1500-2000 mAh/g, reduced swelling vs pure Si, commercial (Tesla)

Lithium_Metal.name: Lithium Metal (Anode)
Lithium_Metal.notes: 3860 mAh/g, ultimate anode, dendrite formation, solid-state batteries

Li4Ti5O12.name: Lithium Titanate
Li4Ti5O12.notes: LTO, 175 mAh/g, zero-strain, ultra-long cycle, fast charge, 1.55V vs Li

TiO2_Anode.name: Titanium Dioxide (Battery Anode)
TiO2_Anode.notes: Anatase TiO2, 335 mAh/g theoretical, safe, fast Li+ transport

Sodium_Metal.name: Sodium Metal (Anode)
Sodium_Metal.notes: 1166 mAh/g, Na-ion batteries, abundant, dendrite issues

LiPF6_Electrolyte.name: Lithium Hexafluorophosphate
LiPF6_Electrolyte.notes: 1M in EC/DMC, standard Li-ion electrolyte salt, conductivity 10 mS/cm

LiTFSI.name: Lithium Bis(trifluoromethanesulfonyl)imide
LiTFSI.notes: High voltage electrolyte salt, Al corrosion, ionic liquids, thermal stability

EC_DMC.name: Ethylene Carbonate / Dimethyl Carbonate
EC_DMC.notes: EC/DMC 1:1, standard Li-ion solvent, SEI formation, wide voltage window

LLZO.name: Lithium Lanthanum Zirconium Oxide
LLZO.notes: Li7La3Zr2O12, garnet, 1 mS/cm, Li metal compatible, solid-state batteries

LGPS.name: Lithium Germanium Phosphorus Sulfide
LGPS.notes: Li10GeP2S12, sulfide, 12 mS/cm, highest conductivity, air sensitive

Argyrodite.name: Lithium Argyrodite
Argyrodite.notes: Li6PS5Cl, sulfide, 3 mS/cm, processable, solid-state batteries

LISICON.name: LISICON (Li2+2xZn1-xGeO4)
LISICON.notes: Lithium Super Ionic Conductor, 0.1 mS/cm, first solid electrolyte

PEO_Electrolyte.name: Polyethylene Oxide (Solid Polymer Electrolyte)
PEO_Electrolyte.notes: PEO+LiTFSI, 0.01 mS/cm at 60°C, flexible, solid-state batteries

LLTO.name: Lithium Lanthanum Titanate
LLTO.notes: Li0.33La0.56TiO3, perovskite, 1 mS/cm, electronic conductivity issue

Pt_C_Catalyst.name: Platinum on Carbon (Fuel Cell Catalyst)
Pt_C_Catalyst.notes: 40-60 wt% Pt/C, ORR/HER catalyst, PEMFC, 0.4 mg Pt/cm²

PtRu_Catalyst.name: Platinum-Ruthenium Catalyst
PtRu_Catalyst.notes: Pt1Ru1, methanol oxidation, DMFC, CO tolerance

IrO2_Catalyst.name: Iridium Oxide (OER Catalyst)
IrO2_Catalyst.notes: Oxygen evolution reaction, PEM electrolysis, acidic environment

NiFe_OER.name: Nickel-Iron Hydroxide (OER Catalyst)
NiFe_OER.notes: NiFe-LDH, alkaline OER, low cost, 1.5-1.6V vs RHE

Nafion.name: Nafion 117
Nafion.notes: Perfluorosulfonic acid, PEMFC, 100 mS/cm hydrated, 183 μm thick

Nafion_212.name: Nafion 212
Nafion_212.notes: PFSA, 50 μm thick, thinner for higher power density

Aquivion.name: Aquivion (Short-Side-Chain PFSA)
Aquivion.notes: Higher conductivity than Nafion, 120 mS/cm, better durability

Silicon_Solar.name: Crystalline Silicon (Solar Grade)
Silicon_Solar.notes: c-Si, mono/poly, 26.7% record efficiency, 90% market share

GaAs_Solar.name: Gallium Arsenide (Solar Cell)
GaAs_Solar.notes: GaAs, 29.1% record, space applications, III-V multijunction

CIGS.name: Copper Indium Gallium Selenide
CIGS.notes: Cu(In,Ga)Se2, thin-film, 23.4% record, flexible, low light performance

CdTe_Solar.name: Cadmium Telluride (Solar Cell)
CdTe_Solar.notes: CdTe, thin-film, 22.1% record, low cost, First Solar

Perovskite_FAPbI3.name: Formamidinium Lead Iodide (Perovskite)
Perovskite_FAPbI3.notes: HC(NH2)2PbI3, more stable than MAPbI3, bandgap tunable

PCBM.name: Phenyl-C61-Butyric Acid Methyl Ester
PCBM.notes: Fullerene acceptor, organic solar cells, 11-13% efficiency

P3HT.name: Poly(3-hexylthiophene)
P3HT.notes: Conjugated polymer donor, organic solar cells, 5% efficiency with PCBM

Spiro_OMeTAD.name: Spiro-OMeTAD
Spiro_OMeTAD.notes: Hole transport material, perovskite solar cells, hygroscopic

FTO_Glass.name: Fluorine-doped Tin Oxide (Transparent Electrode)
FTO_Glass.notes: SnO2:F, TCO, solar cells, 10 Ω/sq, high temp stability

ITO_Solar.name: Indium Tin Oxide (Transparent Electrode)
ITO_Solar.notes: In2O3:Sn, TCO, OLEDs/solar cells, 10 Ω/sq, low temp deposition

TiO2_ETL.name: Titanium Dioxide (Electron Transport Layer)
TiO2_ETL.notes: Anatase TiO2, perovskite solar cells, mesoporous or compact layer

SnO2_ETL.name: Tin Dioxide (Electron Transport Layer)
SnO2_ETL.notes: Low-temp processable ETL, perovskite solar cells, higher conductivity

NiOx_HTL.name: Nickel Oxide (Hole Transport Layer)
NiOx_HTL.notes: NiOx, inverted perovskite solar cells, inorganic HTL

EVA_Encapsulant.name: Ethylene Vinyl Acetate (Solar Encapsulant)
EVA_Encapsulant.notes: EVA, solar module encapsulation, UV stable, 25-year lifetime

LiNixCoyAlzO2.name: Lithium Nickel Cobalt Aluminum Oxide (Generic NCA)
LiNixCoyAlzO2.notes: NCA family, high energy density, thermal stability concerns

LiFSI.name: Lithium Bis(fluorosulfonyl)imide
LiFSI.notes: Higher conductivity than LiPF6, lower viscosity, Al compatible

LiBOB.name: Lithium Bis(oxalato)borate
LiBOB.notes: Electrolyte additive, SEI stabilization, Al corrosion protection

Graphene_Battery.name: Graphene (Battery Additive)
Graphene_Battery.notes: Conductive additive, improves rate capability, Li-S batteries

Vanadium_Redox.name: Vanadium Electrolyte (Redox Flow Battery)
Vanadium_Redox.notes: V2+/V3+ and VO2+/VO2+, flow batteries, grid storage, unlimited cycles
